name: LittleBigPlanet Sackboy's Prehistoric Moves
summary: LittleBigPlanet Sackboy's Prehistoric Moves is a LittleBigPlanet spin-off developed by SCE Worldwide Studios' XDev team, which can be played with two to five players and requires a PlayStation Move controller and a PlayStation Eye Camera. One player uses the PlayStation Move motion controller as a pointing device to manipulate the environment by triggering switches and moving platforms, while the others play using a gamepad to control Sackboy in the usual way. Although billed as a PlayStation Network game, Sackboy's Prehistoric Moves' narrator introduces it as a "demo".
